text:
-18-
Part VIII
CONCLUSION
As previously stated this report is based upon the most reliable
information and figures available at the present time for the obtain¬
ing and developing of an FM radio station for the University. Should
the President and the Board of Trustees wish further exploration in
the field at a later date, we shall be glad to carry out their wishes.
In order to facilitate approval of our license application, it is
necessary that we secure, at the earliest possible date, the services
of a qualified engineer.
Respectfully submitted.
Lee Norvelle
Director o£ Radio
